{"step_by_step_thinking": "The question presents a newborn with cyanosis (a bluish discoloration of the skin due to inadequate oxygenation). The X-ray chest shows oligemic lung field, which means there is reduced blood flow to the lungs. Additionally, the heart size appears normal.
